Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of linear lipopeptides derived from BP100 towards plant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Oliveras À, Baró A, Montesinos L, Badosa E, Montesinos E, Feliu L, Planas M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:84±8% Hemolysis=250 µM,Horse erythrocytes:86±8% Hemolysis=375 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=6.2-12.5µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=6.2-12.5µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae Psa3700.1.1(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Xanthomonas arboricola pv. pruni CFBP 5563(MIC=0.8-1.6µM),Xanthomonas fragariae Xf349-9A(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Penicillium expansum EPS 26(MIC=1.6-3.1µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici ATCC 201829(MIC=0.4-0.8µM)
